author: rhuijben
msg: Provide the already in memory revision properties (like the log message)
to the notify handler while running blame, to allow GUI clients access
to the log messages without running a separate log command.

msg: (notify): Following up on r35363, add missing pointer reference.

author: rhuijben
msg: Provide information in svn_wc_notify_t on whether the notification is about
a path or an url. This allows us to backwards compatible avoid invalid paths
(svn_wc_notify_t): Add new url field and document path as "." or another valid path
when the url is set, because path is documented to always specify a valid absolute
(svn_wc_dup_notify): Make copy of url if set.
(notify): Use url for notifications when available, otherwise use path.
